## Description
Brief description of changes.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Refactoring

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] Type check passes (`pnpm typecheck`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`pnpm lint`)

## Documentation
- [ ] JSDoc added/updated for new exports
- [ ] `@example` tags included for public APIs
- [ ] CHANGELOG entry added (if user-facing)
- [ ] Related docs-sip PR opened (if concept/guide changes needed)
